message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $110.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $130?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $130. How about we meet at $115?
